thread.section_title: Hotel Waldorf Madeleine - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Clean small boutique hotel
thread.title_full: Clean small boutique hotel - Review of Hotel Waldorf Madeleine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: windiveski
title: Clean small boutique hotel
text: Rooms are small. Great central location in the Opera district to walk to every tourist spot. Also 3 min walk to Metro Station. Plenty of restaurants within minutes. Breakfast plans are served in a small dining room. No luggage service. Elevator to access 7 story building.
